title: Bloomberg Markets: Fed Says Capital One Must Resubmit Plan
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Fed Says Capital One Must Resubmit Plan
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Arnold Kakuda Banking and Credit Analyst Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing Capital One Financial Corp. was alone among the largest U.S. banks in stumbling through the Federal Reserve’s annual stress tests, getting conditional approval to pay out capital to shareholders, while all 33 other firms aced the review.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
